content.question: By referring to the lines “affectionate-hearted woman” as both “simple-minded” and “one of the most learned women”, the author suggests that

choices.label: people with undeveloped capacities should be viewed sympathetically
quiet, self-effacing people are often the most ambitious
elegance can evolve from simple physical comforts
a cultivated intellect benefits even ordinary people

content.answer: a cultivated intellect benefits even ordinary people

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
